sections.heading: securities; substitute; when required
sections.text: If the interest on any security pledged as provided in section 8-209 remains unpaid for thirty days after maturity, the trust company shall substitute other securities therefor.SourceLaws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. XVIII, ยง 14, p. 722;C.S.1922, ยง 8076;C.S.1929,
